SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_USERNAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_USERNAME#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Hostname" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_PASSWORD# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_PASSWORD#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DBName" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_DBNAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_DBNAME#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_DBNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DSN" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_DSN# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_DSN#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_DSN#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Request ID" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_AC_REQUEST_ID# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_AC_REQUEST_ID#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_AC_REQUEST_ID#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Status" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_AC_STATUS# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_AC_STATUS#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_AC_STATUS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Status" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_AC_CHECK# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_AC_CHECK#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_AC_CHECK#
echo "********************************"
